**Spoiler Warning** Need help on Castle of Warp
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: **Spoiler Warning** Need help on Castle of Warp
By Sylphine on Thursday, October 4, 2007 - 09:26 am:

I have a problem with a room with white/black floor tile and 4 black boxes to push and fill in the blank spaces to get to the light ball in the room.

I tried until I have no idea how to push it to the right place. (Or at least the game won't let me push it there)

I'm done with the other 2 rooms, but I absolutely stuck on this one.

Thank you for all the help.

By Rinya Leon on Friday, October 5, 2007 - 07:41 pm:

Well, I'm also stuck there... Tried many ways... Really wish that someone who finished the game can answer this question? Please?

By Sylphine on Friday, October 5, 2007 - 10:58 pm:

Finally I got this one solved...

It's like a mirror, push the black box to fill in on the white side will also add a space on the black side.

Push the boxes and fill in the right space and run through to the light ball thing. I didn't remember the direction to push the boxes, but it's just the space near where the boxes are placed.

By Rinya Leon on Saturday, October 6, 2007 - 01:54 am:

Ohh!!! Thx~~~!
I have been stuck there 4 a month!(or more)
Thanks a million! >///<
